item.title: Investing Journey - Weekly Recap #1
item.description: Actions At the beginning of the year, I committed to writing a piece everyday on investing or stocks. Here are the 5 entries of this week: Investing Diary - Issue #1: Texas Pacific Land Corp Investing Diary - Issue #2: Semler Scientific Investing Diary - Issue #3: WildBrain Investing Diary - Issue #4: Loyalty Ventures Inc Investing Diary - Issue #5: Oil and Gas In terms of concrete actions this week:
